LocationPort.summary: The port property of the interface is a string containing the port number of the URL, or the empty string if the port is the default for the protocol.

blockquote.para: If the object refers to a URL that doesn't contain an explicit port number (e.g., https://localhost) or contains a port number that's the default port number corresponding to the protocol part of the URL (e.g., https://localhost:443), then the port property will be the empty string: ''.
